title: ISic030142. ISic030142
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]ΤΑΙΝ[---]
2[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]
3[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]
4.ΑΣΘΡΑΣΥΣΕΜ
5ΜΕΝΙΔΑΣΔΟΡΙ
6ΣΤΟΝΦΟ̄ΝͰΑΠ
7ΑΝΤΟ̄ΝΕΣΤΙͰΥ
8ΠΕΡΤΑΤΟΣΑΚΙΔ
9ΟΝ

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Cassio 1994 with minor emendation of Cordano 2020

English translation

Italian translation

[...] Thrasys Emmenidas di tutti i coraggiosi con la lancia è il migliore degli arcieri (trans. Cordano)

commentary

This document is physically and archaeologically distinct from the tesserae with which it was originally published, from a different context in the sanctuary of Athena at the archaeological site of Kamarina. The revised reading of Cassio, followed by Cordano makes it a dedication by Thrasys for his success with the bow.

bibliography

  • 54.0892 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
